name: argc
description: A small library I have used for years to provide efficient and consistent run-time argument validation.  This is used during development, and can be disabled or easily removed durning the build stage prior to deployment.  This is the first node port, however, and I still need to add tests.  Use with caution!
author: Michael S. Mikowski <mike.mikowski@gmail.com> (http://michaelmikowski.com/)
